Title: Ordinary Wine List
Text:
In Ragunna, becoming a lover of spirits is far easier than steering clear of them.
Every recipe holds a tale, and every tale is traded for a drink. You'll always find something that speaks to your soul—if you can decipher the "codes" of wine.

*What follows is an exclusive selection of wines from Montelli
*Drinks and Descriptions

"When She Steps Into the Garden"
A breeze of joy stirs, carrying the warmth shared between us... Let me revel in the bloom of the flowers you nurtured.
The gate of fantasy swings wide; let me admire the weight of those lush, dropping buds.
Soft murmurs and whispers intertwine, leaving your mind adrift. Indulgence, ecstasy… Isn't that what you've been yearning for?

"Love and Elixir"
Tell me—what truly separates a potion from love?
Both weave illusions, mend shattered hearts—and leave their share of scars.

"Night of Terror"
If you weren't already deep in your cups, would you dare order this?
What are you truly seeking? A savior? A saint? An angle? Very well—you've sent your cry for help.

"The Emperor's New Clothes"
The cleverest deal you'd made, though the glass looks completely empty.
Take it to your companion, the one who has everything—share, and you'll both have a drink.

"TF10"
True or false, 1 or 0.
While sharing this drink, we pledge honesty—a moment when everything must be laid bare.


*You may have noticed that there are no prices on the menu. Nah-uh, that's no oversight. Here, drinks are measured beyond mere coin.
*At the right moment, with the right person, come see me here. Remember, the bars in Ragunna are forever open to whoever wants to order.
